t:
I used to go to bed, someone next to me,
 Now the empty sheets on the pillow are all I can see.

We used to play cards, laughing, just you and me,
 But now they're dusty, scattered on the shelf, you see.

We used to sit on the kitchen floor, talking late at night,
Now the silence is deafening, no one to hold me tight.

We used to eat on a chair, pretending it was a table,
           Now the chair is empty, and I feel so unstable.

We used to travel the world, with a case and a stand,
           Now the stand is cracked, and I'm at a strand.

I miss you so much, you were my everything,
   Now Iâ€™m left with nothing, but memories and a ring.
c:
The first two lines are by Ryan Lee Stiles from "Drew Carey's Improv-A-Ganza". Expanded that into this rhyming pattern.

The background was generated by Stable Diffusion.



#emptiness #play #talk #unstable #broken #memories #love #missing
